name: Time Line Processor
description: Takes data and produces a time line chart end point.

parameters.name: time_field
parameters.description: The name of the field containing the time indicators, for populating the horizontal axis. Must be a unix timestamp. If left out, uses the time the packet arrived.

parameters.name: data_field
parameters.description: The name of the field containing the data (values), for populating the vertical axis.
